    FieldDef(6, 'daysel', EnumType(('selected', 'Mo-Fr', 'Sa-So', 'Mo-So')), comment='Tage')

    FieldDef(0, 'address', IntType(0, 65534), comment='Startadresse')
    FieldDef(1, 'count', IntType(0, 254), comment='number of bytes')
    FieldDef(2, 'data', HexType(), comment='Datenbytes')

r,memory,ram,address,m,UIN,,,Startadresse,count,m,UCH,,,number of bytes,data,s,HEX:*,,,Datenbytes

    FieldDef(0, 'address', IntType(0, 65534), comment='Startadresse')
    FieldDef(1, 'count', IntType(0, 254), comment='number of bytes')
    FieldDef(2, 'data', HexType(), comment='Datenbytes')
